import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterLink, RouterOutlet } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [RouterOutlet, RouterLink], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrl: './app.component.css', }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Online Store'; }
